item.title: Report X-2024061512
item.description:
Report X-2024061512

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-17
  • City: DETROIT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 9700
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dolly on trailer that container was placed became damaged. Investigation into that damage is still under investigation. With damage to the Dolly being present, when the driver attempted to unhook from the trailer, the trailer proceeded to roll onto side. Totes with product appeared to not be secured per AAR guidelines, and 1 tote was damaged & leaked.

item.title: Report I-2024060024
item.description:
Report I-2024060024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-13
  • City: Bay City
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PVS Transportation driver was scheduled to deliver a shipment of Sodium Hydroxide to Michigan Sugar. The driver arrived on site was escorted by an employee and was directed to hook up into the customefs new tank which the driver was told would be the first delivery into tank. Driver hooked up and was making delivery and the connection was not hooked up resulting in approximately 10 gallons of Sodium Hydroxide to be released. 1
